meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Dani Cook Salvatore Parente Greg Seroka Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7057.

td.p: Dani Cook, a librarian from Rancho Cucamonga, California
Salvatore Parente, a glazier from Sunrise, Florida
Greg Seroka, a chef from Steamboat Springs, Colorado (whose 3-day cash winnings total $79,800)

tr.td: MOUNTAIN HIGH
EAR, NOSE & THROAT
TRIOS
"BB" FUN
ON THE BACK OF THE BILL
(Alex: We're talkin' money.)

td.a: NOT AS GREAT AS PUSS IN BOOTS

tr.td: (Puss in Boots: Hola, amigos! Let me tell you about some heroes who are great. But not as great as me--Puss in Boots.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Talk about Pompeii & circumstance! Since 1900, this Italian volcano\'s eruptions have clipped its height about 80 feet')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Talk about Pompeii & circumstance! Since 1900, this Italian volcano's eruptions have clipped its height about 80 feet

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
